Interface IconDescriptor

An object that represents a parsed icon

Hierarchy

  • IconDescriptor

Index

Properties

  • attrs
  • content
  • elem
  • name
  • size
  • svg

Properties

attrs

attrs: object
  • Defined in src/icon/icon.service.ts:44

An object of attributes to apply to the element.

The type here is non-exhaustive.

Type declaration

  • [x: string]: string
  • fill: string
  • height: string
  • viewBox: string
  • width: string
  • xmlns: string

content

content: IconDescriptor[]
  • Defined in src/icon/icon.service.ts:59

The content (children) of the element as an array of IconDescriptors (usually without a few fields, namely name and size)

elem

elem: string
  • Defined in src/icon/icon.service.ts:38

The element to render. For the root this is svg

name

name: string
  • Defined in src/icon/icon.service.ts:65

The name of the icon.

Needed by the icon service.

size

size: number
  • Defined in src/icon/icon.service.ts:71

The size of the icon in pixels.

Needed by the icon service.

Optional svg

svg: string
  • Defined in src/icon/icon.service.ts:76

Optional. A string representation of the compiled svg. If missing the icon service will add this.
